Description:
You send a powerful ball of energy that changes type based on the surrounding weather, dealing 1d8 + MOVE damage of that type.  
|Weather|Type| 
|:--:|:--: 
|Harsh Sunlight|Fire 
|Rain|Water 
|Sandstorm|Rock 
|Hail or Snow|Ice 
|Foggy or Cloudy|Normal
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
